title: Revert application to Draft Version 10 (three drafts earlier)

requirements.text: Revert the codebase and deployed app from the current state (App draft Version 13) back to the state from three drafts earlier (App draft Version 10), undoing all changes introduced in drafts 11–13.

quotes: Forget it revert back to three drafts earlier

acceptanceCriteria: The deployed app reflects the exact UI/behavior of App draft Version 10.
No functionality or content introduced in drafts 11–13 remains in the reverted build.
All automated builds/tests (if present) pass after the revert.

requirements.text: As part of the revert, restore the website visuals/content affected by the recent image/media changes so they match Draft Version 10 (including the Selected Signals “AVAIL — The Nexus Effect” card media behavior and the Hero section background asset/reference).

quotes: Forget it revert back to three drafts earlier

acceptanceCriteria: The “AVAIL — The Nexus Effect” card media matches how it appeared/behaved in Draft Version 10.
The Hero section background matches how it appeared/behaved in Draft Version 10.
No unintended image swap remains anywhere on the site.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/immutablePaths (as defined in SYSTEM_CONTEXT).
Backend must remain a single-actor Motoko architecture; only introduce migration.mo if a state upgrade is truly required by the revert.
nonGoals: Adding new features or new visual redesign beyond what existed in Draft Version 10.
Implementing additional image swap logic or new assets unless they were already present in Draft Version 10.
